issue.summary: Login page not loading properly on mobile devices
issue.description:
When accessing the login page from mobile browsers (iOS Safari and Android Chrome), the page fails to load completely. The form appears but the submit button is cut off and the background image doesn't display.

## Steps to reproduce:
1. Open mobile browser
2. Navigate to /login
3. Observe layout issues

## Expected behavior:
Login form should be fully visible and functional on all devices.

comments.content: I've started investigating this issue. It looks like a CSS media query problem.
comments.content_html: I've started investigating this issue. It looks like a CSS media query problem.

comments.content: Thanks @bob! I also noticed that the issue appears on tablets in portrait mode. Might want to test with iPad as well.
comments.content_html: Thanks @bob! I also noticed that the issue appears on tablets in portrait mode. Might want to test with iPad as well.

I can reproduce this on my Android phone. The submit button is definitely cut off. Here's a quick fix idea:

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .login-form { padding-bottom: 2rem; }
}
